metadata.title: Chocolatey Common Shortcut Extension
metadata.summary: Helper functions for use during install of Chocolatey packages.
metadata.description:
This package provides helper functions installed as a Chocolatey extension. These functions may be used in Chocolatey install/uninstall scripts by declaring this package a dependency in your package's nuspec.
## Installing
<`dependencies`>   <`dependency id="chocolatey-commonshortcut.extension" /`> <`/dependencies`>
